descript.abstract: Zoning Areas within Municipal Areas of Gaston County. Zoning information provided by each municipality and digitized by Planning GIS using existing Street and Roadway, Property Parcel and other available data.
descript.purpose: Developed for Jurisdictional, Planning and Tax purposes.
descript.supplinf: Municipal Zoning information supplied by local municipalities.

idinfo.accconst: Although care has been taken in the creation of this data, Gaston County does not make or imply any warranties as to its accuracy or assume any responsibility for its use.
idinfo.useconst: This data MAY NOT be resold, or otherwise used for trade or commercial purposes, as defined by NCGS 132-10. (See http://www.ncga.state.nc.us/statutes/generalstatutes/html/bychapter/chapter%5F132.html )
idinfo.datacred: Gaston County, Department of Planning Updated on PublicGIS: 04.13.2020
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.3000

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

dataIdInfo.idPurp: Developed for Jurisdictional, Planning and Tax purposes.
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Zoning Areas within Municipal Areas of Gaston County. Zoning information provided by each municipality and digitized by Planning GIS using existing Street and Roadway, Property Parcel and other available data.

Published on 10.07.2024
dataIdInfo.idCredit:
Belmont Planning & Zoning Department Physical Address: 1401 E. Catawba St. Belmont, NC 28012
Mailing Address: PO Box 431 Belmont, NC 28012
planning@cityofbelmont.org (704) 901-2610
Gaston County Building & Development Services Physical Address: Gaston County Administrative Building 128 West Main Avenue Gastonia, North Carolina 28052
Mailing Address: Gaston County Building & Development Services PO Box 1578 Gastonia, North Carolina 28053-1578
planninggis@gastongov.com 704-866-3195

Consts.useLimit:
Any maps, reports, or publications created using the digital data provided by Gaston County shall give credit to Gaston County by using the following statement/disclaimer: “This (map/report/publication) was created using various GIS Data sources, including Gaston County’s GIS data.”

This data MAY NOT be resold, or otherwise used for trade or commercial purposes, as defined by NCGS 132-10. (https://www.ncleg.net/EnactedLegislation/Statutes/HTML/BySection/Chapter_132/GS_132-10.html)
